description: A middleware to handle dropzone/file upload state
name: dropzone

scripts.browserify: browserify Dropzone.js --standalone Dropzone -o bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.prod: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.watch: watchify Dropzone.js --standalone Dropzone -o bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
